channel.title: Find out amount of items ingame
channel.description: How can i check who has what items ingame? IE look for dupers and such.

item.title: Find out amount of items ingame
item.dc:creator: @Tobbo88 Tobbo88
item.description:
@Tobbo88 wrote:

Its a easyrsc basicly but with basic SQL added for scripts like amount of online players.

Read full topic
item.source: Find out amount of items ingame

item.title: Find out amount of items ingame
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

What source are you using? If you are using EasyRSC theres no ‘Easy’ way to do this. If you are using RSCD source then you’ll use SQL database to where the data is stored rather than player data being saved to files…

If you are using EasyRSC you could download a notepad++ or something along those lines open all the players saved files and do some sort of search.

If it’s an RSCD source and you are using SQL you could just write a simple script to search the database.

Read full topic
